item.title: About
item.description:
I’m Inanna Malick. I build things in Rust and poke at the edges of what LLMs can do. Currently interested in AI security, agentic systems, and LLM cognition.

This blog: Rust, Haskell and LLM research. Sometimes all three at the same time.

Contact: inanna [at] [this domain].wtf

Elsewhere:

  • GitHub: inanna-malick
  • Bluesky: @hikikomorphism
